languages.text: "Отряд сопровождения докладывает, что аномалии уже ополовинили отряд, но они намерены продвигаться вперед или погибнуть все до единого".
"The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."
languages.original_text: "Отряд сопровождения докладывает, что аномалии уже ополовинили отряд, но они намерены продвигаться вперед или погибнуть все до единого".

traits.locale_text: "The escort troop reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but they are determined to advance forward or die trying."
"The escort troop reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but they are determined to advance forward or die trying."
"The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."
"The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."
"The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."

languages.text: “小队报告说，由于受到异象影响，他们已经减员了一半左右，但他们决心继续推进，直至全体阵亡。”
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."

traits.locale_text: “小队报告说，由于受到异象影响，他们已经减员了一半左右，但他们决心继续推进，直至全体阵亡。”

languages.text: «El escuadrón escolta informa que las anomalías ya han mermado a la mitad sus efectivos, pero que están decididos a avanzar o morir en el intento».
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."

traits.locale_text: «El escuadrón escolta informa que las anomalías ya han mermado a la mitad sus efectivos, pero que están decididos a avanzar o morir en el intento».

languages.text: 「護衛部隊は、アノマリーによって自分達の人数はすでに半分まで減らされているが、前進するか死ぬ気で頑張るかを決心したと報告しています」
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛部隊は、アノマリーによって自分達の人数はすでに半分まで減らされているが、前進するか死ぬ気で頑張るかを決心したと報告しています」

languages.text: « L'escorte rapporte que les anomalies ont déjà décimé la moitié de ses soldats, mais ces derniers sont déterminés à poursuivre leur mission même s'ils doivent y perdre la vie. »
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."

traits.locale_text: « L'escorte rapporte que les anomalies ont déjà décimé la moitié de ses soldats, mais ces derniers sont déterminés à poursuivre leur mission même s'ils doivent y perdre la vie. »

languages.text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass die Anomalien ihre Zahl bereits halbiert haben, dass sie aber entschlossen sind, weiter vorzurücken oder bei dem Versuch zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the anomalies have already whittled their numbers in half, but that they are determined to advance forward or die trying."

traits.locale_text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass die Anomalien ihre Zahl bereits halbiert haben, dass sie aber entschlossen sind, weiter vorzurücken oder bei dem Versuch zu sterben."
